At What Price Should the Celtics Trade for Kevin Durant?
FTR and the Briscoes Up the Ante (and Darby Allin’s Sacrifice)

Russell Westbrook’s Moment of Truth For years, the relentless guard dominated the NBA, bending the game to his will. But for the last couple, he’s failed to get the message, both from Father Time and his coaches: Either adapt and accept a smaller role—or get out of the way.
At What Price Should the Celtics Trade for Kevin Durant? Boston would reportedly need to break up its Finals core to meet Brooklyn’s asking price. The temptation of KD might be too strong to resist.

Is Donovan Mitchell Really the Right Star for the Knicks? New York has the pieces to bring Utah’s All-Star guard to Broadway, but it should be hesitant to go all in. As good as Mitchell is, questions remain about his ability to carry a team.
